dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Real-time aquaculture monitoring and control
dashboard.historicalData: Historical sensor data trends and patterns
dashboard.aerationActive: Aeration system is active - maintaining optimal oxygen levels
dashboard.considerAeration: Consider activating aeration to maintain oxygen levels
dashboard.temperatureElevated: Temperature is elevated - consider increasing water circulation
dashboard.temperatureLowMonitor: Temperature is low - monitor fish behavior closely
dashboard.phAcidic: pH is slightly acidic - check alkalinity levels
dashboard.phElevated: pH is elevated - consider water treatment
dashboard.turbidityHighFilter: High turbidity detected - filtration system check recommended
dashboard.allOptimal: All parameters within optimal ranges - system performing well
dashboard.forecastStable: Based on current trends: Temperature expected to remain stable, pH levels may fluctuate slightly due to feeding schedule. Recommend monitoring turbidity after next feeding cycle.

marketPrices.firebaseDescription: This page is prepared for real-time market data integration with Firebase. Connect your Firebase database to display live pricing from actual fish markets and enable real-time updates.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Connect with the AquaVise team and community
contact.reachOut: Reach out to us for support, partnerships, or inquiries
contact.followUs: Follow us on social media for updates and community engagement
contact.ourMission: Our mission and the team behind smart aquaculture monitoring
contact.missionDescription1: AquaVise is revolutionizing aquaculture through intelligent monitoring systems that combine IoT sensors, AI analytics, and real-time data processing. Our mission is to empower fish farmers across Nigeria and beyond with the tools they need to optimize their operations, reduce losses, and increase profitability.
contact.missionDescription2: Founded in 2023, we've been working closely with local fish farmers to understand their challenges and develop solutions that are both technologically advanced and practically applicable. Our systems monitor water quality parameters, predict potential issues, and provide actionable insights to help farmers make informed decisions.
contact.innovationDesc: Continuously advancing aquaculture technology for better outcomes
contact.communityDesc: Supporting local farmers and building stronger food systems
contact.teamDescription: The experts behind AquaVise's innovative solutions
contact.supportDescription: Our support team is here to help you get the most out of your AquaVise system. Whether you need technical assistance, have questions about features, or want to provide feedback, we're just a message away.

socialDescriptions.twitter: Follow us for updates and aquaculture tips
socialDescriptions.facebook: Join our community of fish farmers
